headline: Is Onsemi (ON) Still Attractive After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether ON Semiconductor's current share price offers value or simply reflects past excitement, it helps to step back and look at what the recent numbers and news are actually saying. The stock recently closed at US$60.58, with a 10.0% gain over the last 30 days, a 6.8% return year to date, a 9.7% return over 1 year, a 8.7% decline over 3 years, and a 59.7% return over 5 years. Recent headlines around ON Semiconductor have focused on its role in semiconductors,...
